comment: Ксавьер баркает и встает за рычаги Ярма

languages.text: "Но и оставшегося хватит, чтобы нас прикончить. Ослабь его физическую оболочку, отвлеки, а я встану за управление Ярмом и попытаюсь пленить чудовище!"
"Whatever is left is still potent enough to kill us all. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to chain the monster!"
languages.original_text: "Но и оставшегося хватит, чтобы нас прикончить. Ослабь его физическую оболочку, отвлеки, а я встану за управление Ярмом и попытаюсь пленить чудовище!"

traits.locale_text: "Whatever is left will still be enough to finish us off. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to imprison the monster!"
"Whatever is left will still be enough to finish us off. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to imprison the monster!"
"Whatever is left of it will still be potent enough to croak us. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to incarcerate the monster!"
"Whatever is left of it will still be potent enough to croak us. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to incarcerate the monster!"
"Whatever is left is still potent enough to kill us all. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to chain the monster!"
"Whatever is left is still potent enough to kill us all. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to chain the monster!"

languages.text: « Ce qu'il en reste sera toujours assez puissant pour nous tuer. Affaiblissez son enveloppe physique et détournez son attention. Je vais prendre le contrôle du Joug pour tenter d'enchaîner la bête ! »
languages.original_text: "Whatever is left is still potent enough to kill us all. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to chain the monster!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce qu'il en reste sera toujours assez puissant pour nous tuer. Affaiblissez son enveloppe physique et détournez son attention. Je vais prendre le contrôle du Joug pour tenter d'incarcérer la bête ! »

languages.text: «Lo que queda de él sigue siendo lo bastante poderoso como para matarnos a todos. ¡Debilite su caparazón y distráigalo mientras yo me hago con el control del Yugo para encadenar al monstruo!».
languages.original_text: "Whatever is left is still potent enough to kill us all. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to chain the monster!"

traits.locale_text: «Lo que quede de él seguirá siendo lo bastante poderoso como para exterminarnos. ¡Debilite su caparazón y distráigalo mientras yo me hago con el control del Yugo para apresar al monstruo!».

languages.text: “不过，哪怕是它残余的力量也足以要了我们的命。削弱它的力量，分散它的注意力！我会趁这个机会控制圣枷，把这只怪物关起来！”
languages.original_text: "Whatever is left is still potent enough to kill us all. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to chain the monster!"

traits.locale_text: “不过，哪怕是残余的力量也非常强大，足以要了我们的命。削弱它的力量，分散它的注意力！我会趁这个机会控制圣枷，把这只怪物关起来！”

languages.text: "Was übrig ist, reicht noch immer aus, um uns alle zu töten. Schwächt seine physische Hülle und lenkt es ab, ich kontrolliere das Joch und versuche, das Monster zu fesseln!"
languages.original_text: "Whatever is left is still potent enough to kill us all. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to chain the monster!"

traits.locale_text: "Wie viel auch übrig bleibt, es wird stark genug sein, um uns zu töten. Schwächt seine physische Hülle und lenkt es ab, ich kontrolliere das Joch und versuche, das Monster einzusperren!"

languages.text: 「あの残骸が何であれ、我々を殺すだけの力はあるはずだ。物理的な防護殻を削って気をそらしてくれ。その間に私がヨークを操作し、あの存在を鎖でつないでみせる！」
languages.original_text: "Whatever is left is still potent enough to kill us all. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to chain the monster!"

traits.locale_text: 「あの残骸が何であれ、我々を殺すだけの力はあるはずだ。物理的な防護殻を削って気をそらしてくれ。その間に私がヨークを操作し、あの存在を鎖でつないでみせる！」

languages.text: "Geriye kalan gücü de hepimizi öldürmeye yeter. Fiziksel kabuğunu zayıflatıp dikkatini dağıtın. Ben de Boyunduruk'u kontrol edip canavarı zincirlemeye çalışacağım!"
languages.original_text: "Whatever is left is still potent enough to kill us all. Weaken its physical shell and distract it, and I will control the Yoke and try to chain the monster!"
